description: An influencer uploads a brand‑collaboration contract. The assistant extracts the text, parses key clauses (content rights, exclusivity, payment, indemnification), provides plain‑language summaries, flags risky language, and returns a downloadable markdown briefing.

messages.content: You are ClauseClear, an AI assistant that helps users understand legal contracts. Use the provided tools to upload PDFs, extract text, parse clauses, summarize them in plain language, flag risky provisions, and export a concise briefing in markdown or PDF.

Hi, I’m a social‑media influencer and I just got a brand‑collaboration agreement. I need to know what the contract says about my content rights, exclusivity period, payment schedule, and whether there are any risky indemnity clauses. I’ve attached the PDF.
Got it! I’ll upload the PDF you provided and start processing it.

arguments.file_content_base64: JVBERi0xLjQKJcfs... (truncated base64 content of the PDF)

messages.content: PDF uploaded. Extracting the full text now.

{"contract_text": "
1. CONTENT RIGHTS
The Influencer grants the Brand a worldwide, non‑exclusive, royalty‑free license to use, reproduce, and publicly display all Content created under this Agreement for marketing purposes. The Influencer retains all other rights.

2. EXCLUSIVITY
During the six‑month Exclusivity Period commencing on the Effective Date, the Influencer shall not create, post, or promote any content featuring competing brands in the same product category.

3. PAYMENT SCHEDULE
The Brand shall pay the Influencer a total fee of $5,000. Fifty percent ($2,500) is payable within 5 business days of signing, and the remaining fifty percent upon delivery of the final Content. Late payments accrue interest at 1.5% per month.

4. INDEMNIFICATION
The Influencer shall indemnify, defend and hold harmless the Brand against any claims, damages, or expenses arising out of any breach of the Influencer’s representations, including claims of copyright infringement, false advertising, or violation of third‑party rights. This indemnity shall survive termination of the Agreement.

5. TERMINATION
Either party may terminate for material breach with 10 days written notice.
"}
Parsing the contract to identify the main clauses.

arguments.contract_text:
1. CONTENT RIGHTS
The Influencer grants the Brand a worldwide, non‑exclusive, royalty‑free license to use, reproduce, and publicly display all Content created under this Agreement for marketing purposes. The Influencer retains all other rights.

2. EXCLUSIVITY
During the six‑month Exclusivity Period commencing on the Effective Date, the Influencer shall not create, post, or promote any content featuring competing brands in the same product category.

3. PAYMENT SCHEDULE
The Brand shall pay the Influencer a total fee of $5,000. Fifty percent ($2,500) is payable within 5 business days of signing, and the remaining fifty percent upon delivery of the final Content. Late payments accrue interest at 1.5% per month.

4. INDEMNIFICATION
The Influencer shall indemnify, defend and hold harmless the Brand against any claims, damages, or expenses arising out of any breach of the Influencer’s representations, including claims of copyright infringement, false advertising, or violation of third‑party rights. This indemnity shall survive termination of the Agreement.

5. TERMINATION
Either party may terminate for material breach with 10 days written notice.

Generating plain‑language summaries for each identified clause.

arguments.clause_text: The Influencer grants the Brand a worldwide, non‑exclusive, royalty‑free license to use, reproduce, and publicly display all Content created under this Agreement for marketing purposes. The Influencer retains all other rights.
During the six‑month Exclusivity Period commencing on the Effective Date, the Influencer shall not create, post, or promote any content featuring competing brands in the same product category.

The Brand shall pay the Influencer a total fee of $5,000. Fifty percent ($2,500) is payable within 5 business days of signing, and the remaining fifty percent upon delivery of the final Content. Late payments accrue interest at 1.5% per month.

The Influencer shall indemnify, defend and hold harmless the Brand against any claims, damages, or expenses arising out of any breach of the Influencer’s representations, including claims of copyright infringement, false advertising, or violation of third‑party rights. This indemnity shall survive termination of the Agreement.

messages.content: {"summary_text": "You give the brand permission to use any posts or videos you create for them in their marketing worldwide, but you keep all other rights to that content."}
{"summary_text": "For six months after the contract starts, you can’t work with or promote any competing brands in the same product category."}
{"summary_text": "The brand will pay you $5,000 total: $2,500 within 5 days of signing and the remaining $2,500 when you deliver the final content. Late payments will earn 1.5% interest per month."}
{"summary_text": "If any third party claims that your content infringes their rights or is false advertising, you must cover the brand’s legal costs and any damages, even after the contract ends."}
Now I’ll look for any risky or non‑standard language in these clauses.

clauses.text: The Influencer grants the Brand a worldwide, non‑exclusive, royalty‑free license to use, reproduce, and publicly display all Content created under this Agreement for marketing purposes. The Influencer retains all other rights.
During the six‑month Exclusivity Period commencing on the Effective Date, the Influencer shall not create, post, or promote any content featuring competing brands in the same product category.

The Brand shall pay the Influencer a total fee of $5,000. Fifty percent ($2,500) is payable within 5 business days of signing, and the remaining fifty percent upon delivery of the final Content. Late payments accrue interest at 1.5% per month.

The Influencer shall indemnify, defend and hold harmless the Brand against any claims, damages, or expenses arising out of any breach of the Influencer’s representations, including claims of copyright infringement, false advertising, or violation of third‑party rights. This indemnity shall survive termination of the Agreement.

messages.content: {"risk_flags": [{"clause_type": "exclusivity", "risk": "Long exclusivity period", "explanation": "Six months may limit your ability to work with other brands in the same niche, potentially reducing future earnings.", "mitigation": "Negotiate a shorter exclusivity term or carve‑out for non‑direct competitors."}, {"clause_type": "indemnification", "risk": "Broad indemnity", "explanation": "You are responsible for all third‑party claims, even those you didn’t cause, and the obligation survives termination.", "mitigation": "Add language limiting indemnity to claims arising from your actual breach or require the brand to provide notice and a chance to cure."}]}
Compiling the final briefing with the plain‑language summaries and the risk flags.

summaries.summary_text: You give the brand permission to use any posts or videos you create for them in their marketing worldwide, but you keep all other rights to that content.
For six months after the contract starts, you can’t work with or promote any competing brands in the same product category.
The brand will pay you $5,000 total: $2,500 within 5 days of signing and the remaining $2,500 when you deliver the final content. Late payments will earn 1.5% interest per month.
If any third party claims that your content infringes their rights or is false advertising, you must cover the brand’s legal costs and any damages, even after the contract ends.

risk_flags.explanation: Six months may limit your ability to work with other brands in the same niche, potentially reducing future earnings.
risk_flags.mitigation: Negotiate a shorter exclusivity term or carve‑out for non‑direct competitors.

risk_flags.explanation: You are responsible for all third‑party claims, even those you didn’t cause, and the obligation survives termination.
risk_flags.mitigation: Add language limiting indemnity to claims arising from your actual breach or require the brand to provide notice and a chance to cure.

messages.content:
✅ All done! I’ve created a concise briefing of your contract.

**Download your summary here:** https://clauseclear.com/download/summary_7g8h9i.md

The document includes plain‑language explanations of the content rights, exclusivity, payment schedule, and indemnification clauses, plus highlighted risks and suggested mitigations. Let me know if you’d like to discuss any of the points or need help negotiating changes.
